name: Care and Glow Serum Concealer with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A multiuse, serum-infused, medium-coverage concealer with up to 24-hour hydration and a natural-soft, glowing-skin finish...Coverage: Medium..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps the skin..- Ceramides & Peptides: Known to protect and smooth skin surface...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: With an 81 percent serum base formula, this hydrating concealer is best for visibly brightening, blurring, and enhancing features for a soft, glowing, natural makeup look. The creamy formula blends into the skin easily and allows for multiuse purpose with its unique applicator. No creasing or caking for up to 12 hours.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps the skin..-Ceramides & Peptides: Known to protect and smooth skin surface...Au, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Propanediol, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Sunflower Seed Oil, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Tin Oxide, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Paraffin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica Silylate, Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine, Alumina, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Carnosine, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Conceal and spot correct: .-Use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover any discoloration, pigmentation, and blemishes...Brighten and blur: .-Use a shade one to two shades lighter than your skin tone for under-eye area. Will help to minimize the appearance of fine lines and create a lifted eye effect. ..Contour: .-Use a shade two to three shades deeper than your skin tone to sculpt or warm complexion...All over coverage: .-Use a shade that matches your skin tone for a natural makeup look, touch-ups, or to pair with your favorite foundation.

reviews.review_title: Back to the full coverage Lancome concealer for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't work for me.  I really like the other Lancome concealer, but my color kept showing as out of stock.  So I tried this newer formulation.  And I really tried...a few days with different techniques...was sheer and patchy.  No matter what I did, I just couldn't get it to blend well without just coming off.  And no matter how short or long I waited after applying - the setting powder just made it patchier.   If Lancome doesn't restock their full coverage concealer, I'll be at a loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancôme Care and Glow Serum Concealer with Hyaluronic Acid as a free sample, and I was absolutely blown away! It provides a perfect blend of coverage and a natural, radiant finish that doesn’t look cakey or heavy. The added hyaluronic acid feels amazing on my skin, keeping it hydrated throughout the day, which is a huge plus for my under-eye area. I used it every day until I finished it and am already planning to repurchase! I loved it so much that I even bought the matching foundation to complete my look. Highly recommend this concealer for anyone looking for a blend of skincare and flawless makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The concealer delivers a blend of medium coverage and a natural, radiant finish. It’s lightweight, which feels comfortable for all-day wear, and the added hyaluronic acid provides a boost of hydration, helping the product feel more like skincare than makeup. However, I noticed that it doesn’t hold up as well in high-humidity environments or on oily skin without setting powder. It works best on drier areas, brightening them without settling into fine lines too much. Overall, this is a nice option for those who want a more luminous, skin-like finish. I’d say it’s best suited for normal to dry skin types who prefer a natural look.

reviews.review_text: This has to be one of my favorite concealers thus far. I’ve tried a lot. I’m 32 with combo skin so most concealers are too heavy for me anymore. This is light and skin like.  It provides a dewy but radiant refreshed coverage. When I use powder (tower28) it does NOT break down. It lasts all day for work.  I find myself wanting to use this only with no other foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am  in love with this concealer.It is perfect shade and consistence for my skin. I will recomended it to my friends..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I need to write this review so this company knows how much this product is a winner. I will buy this product forever if they keep making it. This is a beautiful, lightweight, water-based concealer with medium buildable coverage. The best part? NO SILICONES!! I have very sensitive skin that is extremely reactive to silicones in products, causing cystic and closed comedones when used. I almost gave up ever being able to find makeup I could wear because they all contained silicones or were extremely drying and flaky on my face. Not this one! It is so beautiful and leaves a dewy glow on my skin, I use this as a lightweight foundation that's how much I love it! It stays on all day and doesn't separate from my skin or flake (another major problem I faced with base makeup). It's affordable and lasts a long time (even when used daily). Seriously, if you have sensitive skin like me that is prone to pore-clogging and is on the dryer/combo side, this allowed me to wear base makeup again. I love it! Thank you, Lancome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this concealer practically every day for a few months. In general, it's definitely worth every cent. It's very hydrating and dewy! It's sheer coverage but i personally don't see this as being very buildable. It's great for a lightweight, natural look. It blends so well (i blend with my fingertips or a slightly damp beauty blender).     I'm pale (think like, 'timothee chalamet' pale) and the 120N was the closest shade match I could find. I also haven't noticed any irritation. I have textured, oily-combo skin with large subcutaneous glands. This concealer wears off fairly quick, maybe four hours after application? I don't recommend if you sweat a bunch or live in a humid climate.  I use this underneath foundation and it gives me a near-perfect base! It performs so well underneath the other layers of makeup. I layer Fit Me! Matte Foundation in 112N over it.   I used Burt's Bee's Cheek Tint as a blush along with Iconic London's Liquid Illuminator Highlight (in the reddish blush shade). It doesn't pill or soak away the pigment like other serum-based makeup.   It hides my redness perfectly, and evens out my skin tone without looking overdone. I use this concealer by itself on days I stay in, or generally speaking, whenever I don't feel like doing a full face lol.   It's the best concealer on the market imo & the best choice for textured / rough skin.

Let me tell you, it’s that good. Seriously the perfect everyday concealer. I’ve never had a better shade for me in a concealer. I had dry skin but I love lightweight concealers. I can never find one that is light and hydrating, until the Lancôme Care and Glow. This stuff was seriously life changing for me! The coverage is medium but buildable. I could rave about this concealer forever!!

reviews.review_text: the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Concealer, and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed. As a beauty enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for products that not only provide excellent coverage but also enhance the natural radiance of the skin, and this concealer delivered on both.   Upon application, I found that it effortlessly concealed imperfections, dark circles, and any discoloration, leaving behind a smooth, flawless finish. What's more, the formula is buildable, allowing for customized coverage without feeling heavy or cakey. I was particularly impressed by how seamlessly it blended into my skin, providing a natural-looking, yet high-coverage result.  the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Concealer also boasts elegant and practical packaging. The sleek, slender tube is not only aesthetically pleasing but also convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. It’s my honest opinion .. I highly recommend this concealer …

Not only it’s not inclusive enough, but the description needs more work. I bought 230W which described as light with warm undertones. But when I received it and swatch it, it’s definitely light-medium which is too dark for me. I have the teint idole concealer in 250W which have the same description as this, but it’s two times lighter. It confuses someone like me who only able to purchase online.

reviews.review_title: Game changer for mature skin and minimalist look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im LOVING this for my 50 y.o. skin. I’ve inexplicably developed some eczema on my face (thanks perimenopause?) and I dab a little under my eyes, creases in nose and over eczema redness.  I know there is still redness in the phot, but it has cut out so much of it. Also doesn’t make my eczema flare like other makeup does. Just have to be sure not to put too much on (and blend really well if you do). After blending with my fingers, it doesn’t settle in the cracks or in the little eczema numbs. Hours the pores on my nose. And has some luminosity.

reviews.review_text: This Lancôme Care and Glow Concealer is amazing! I have pretty pale skin so I was sent the 105W, which is their palest shade in this product. This product is great for anyone but it is extra great for anyone who is a non-makeup makeup fan because it is super light and very blendable, and is used as a medium coverage concealer. When I used this product it left my skin with a dewy glow but definitely not “over done,” and one layer lasted most of the day for me.  Since the base of this product is serum it melts right into my skin instead of just sitting on top of my skin, and it surprisingly matched my skin tone to a T! For anyone sensitive to smells in products, this product did not have a distinct smell. Overall, this is a great concealer that gives my skin a very natural glow without all the fuss!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 120N - fair with neutral peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion. I tested the shade 120N; which is quite light of course, and a decent color for areas where I needed some brightening and concealer work. Lancome is a tried and trusted brand, and I am a fan of their complexion products in general. I think to use this product regularly moving forward, I would potentially need a different shade to get a true concealing effect for blemishes.  I did notice that the concealer would cling a bit to areas that had dry skin, like healing blemishes, or face fuzz. It took on a bit of a patchy appearance then. Otherwise, it concealed well with build-up, and didn’t cause any additional drying out of the skin.   The applicator is comfortable with curved and flat areas to allow use anywhere on the face, with medium buildable coverage. I personally had more success blending this in with a tapping motions or a sponge rather than blending in with a rubbing or brushing motion as the product tended to move around just a bit on application. This gets better when applied over a base vs bare skin.  I appreciate the concealer’s added skin benefits, particularly as my skin matures (and the rest of my body honestly, haha). This product contains 71% serum base with hyaluronic acid and ceramides. I am curious if all of the added benefits would properly penetrate your skin when using this on top of primer and foundation.  Based on my personal skin and experience, I rate this product a 7 to 7.5 out of 10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancôme Teint Idole Ulta Wear Care & Glow Serum Concealer from Influenster & Lancôme in exchange for my honest review. Received 305N color and Retails for $29.00 for 13 ML /0.43 FL Oz Size.   What It Is: A multi-use, medium coverage serum concealer with up to 24hr hydration and a natural, soft glow finish. It’s a 81% serum based concealer, with no creasing/caking for 12 hrs.   My Review: I wear concealer literally everyday. I use it mainly as an under-eye concealer, to coverup blemishes, and to brighten/highlight. But with the concealers I’ve used in the past, they tend to feel heavy on my face and start to crease after a few hours of wear. This serum is completely different and I’m in love with it! First off the applicator gives you a pointy end for smaller jobs, and a curved area for bigger jobs. It makes it very easy to apply to different areas. I noticed no smell at all which I prefer. Secondly I noticed how easily blendable it was. I tried with a brush and beauty blender, and personally liked the results of beauty blender better.  Once applied, it felt like I had nothing on. So it was super lightweight and very comfortable. After wearing it all day, I noticed no creasing/caking. I never had to do any touch ups throughout the day which was a relief! I do always use a moisturizer, then primer before applying my makeup, and a setting spray at the end. The color 305N was a perfect match to my skin tone. It’s very buildable and it covered my blemishes perfectly. But my absolute favorite thing about this concealer is that it is serum based, has hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and peptides in it. Because of those ingredients my face felt so hydrated, and smooth. So it’s a mixture between a makeup and skincare item. It is definitely my new favorite concealer and highly recommend it!

The product comes with a cute and convenient applicator which makes it very pleasant to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Concealer for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion about this product. I received the concealer in the shade 330N. Unfortunately, the shade I picked did not match my skin tone. Its very light for my skin tone even as a concealer. To review the product, I still tried using it for few days. I mixed it with my Lancôme foundation to kind of make it match my skin tone. The formula of this concealer is thin yet buildable and very pigmented. You can easily blend it with your fingertips or using a beauty blender or a brush. It’s so easy and blendable almost like a skincare product. The concealer also has this sheer shimmer to it that gives your skin a glow which I really loved it. I mostly only used the concealer for my undereye and some days for my hyperpigmentation around my lips. It’s a very glowy formula so if you are someone who doesn’t like a formula that gives you a glowy finish concealer then probably this concealer is not the product for you. I have combination oily skin in T Zone, so this formula did not affect my skin or make me feel extra oily. It did not crease on me or set into my lines. This concealer is worth 30$ for product you receive. Apart from the shade not matching my skin tone II really loved this concealer and loved the formula and would recommend this product to anyone who’s looking for a new concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this concealer at the moment! The shade match is spot on shade for highlighting. I love how my makeup comes out when I use this concealer. It’s super buildable and lightweight. Feels like I have nothing on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I like it. Most of the concealers I’ve tried have creased on me not long after applying them. This one hasn’t creased on me yet. I don’t wear it all day though. It’s buildable and blends pretty smoothly. It feels moisturizing too.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Serum Concealer complimentary from Lancome and Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Let me start by saying, I am SO bummed I picked the wrong shade. Well, maybe not the wrong shade... I picked a color that would work great for me in the summer but since my tan has faded, it's entirely too dark, so no makeup tutorial is coming now. 😭 However, I still tried it out and will base my review on that... It claims to be a multi-use, serum infused medium buildable coverage concealer with up to 24hr hydration and natural soft glow finish. It is a hydrating concealer. The coverage felt more light to medium, even though a little goes a long way. And when I say a little goes a long way, I mean it. I put on the tiniest dab, just to see how it would apply and it covered a very large area. The container is also much larger than I expected and considering how little you need to use, I would say it's well worth the $30 price point. Like I said in the beginning, I am so bummed I got the wrong color- but that's totally my own fault. I really like the way it applies and I like the finish, it's especially nice for dry skin like mine.

If you're looking for a concealer that does it all, you've found it! Lancôme's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Serum Concealer is a must-try.

reviews.review_text: Wow! I really LOVE this concealer I wasn’t expecting to fall in love but it’s perfect. Natural finish blends like a dream and looks amazing!! No creasing around here. Definitely will be using this for the rest of my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was a little too light so I gave it to my daughter. It looked really good on her and it blended perfectly. I love how it really brought her makeup look together, it definitely gave her a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a great smooth concealer to conceal hunny this is it.  It went great with my makeup and helped cover my dark spots and uneven tone. Absolutely amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a pretty pink face and it neutralizes the skin perfectly. I like to use this instead of foundation. I really havent found anything else that neutralizes my skin and doesnt show texture.  I would definitely reccomend this to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *gifted product review*   For a serum concealer, this concealer does give a good amount of coverage! I think I should’ve gotten a little bit more of a warmer tone but will be good for the winter months.  The shape of applicator is great however, it is hard. I felt like it was pulling off some of my foundation while I was putting on the concealer. Overall- good stuff! Great for “no makeup” makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful glow that stays on the face the coverage is great, impeccable. I am in love with this foundation. Not to mention the luxurious packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite concealer it goes on so smoothly and it's so easy to blend! I absolutely love this product so much! It's my new all time favorite product and I will be repurchasing this amazing stuff!
